name: foolhardily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves taking unnecessary risks: I had bravely, or perhaps foolhardily, left my office job to pursue the freelance life. The dramatic climax of the story is reached when she foolhardily jumps out of a window and runs away.
More examplesFewer examplesDiagnosed with a rare condition, she badly needed blood, which her mother foolhardily resisted.She takes great pride in foolhardily rushing into freezing cold water in nothing but a swimming costume.His opponent bravely, or perhaps foolhardily, moved his queen next to his opponent's king.
